title: (13250) Daimiel - Unnamed Road
description: Parking on the edge of the Navaseca lagoon, without service. There is no prohibition sign. Tour to the lagoon of 3 km on foot, with observatories and many birds to see. Quiet and friendly.

title: (13250) Daimiel - 30 Paseo Carmen
description: Station service in Daimiel signposted by Cepsa where motorhomes are welcome. It has a car park, black and gray water drainage areas, and drinking water filling. Sale of butane and propane, firewood and biomass. It has a free shower for guests and a cafeteria. Very clean bathrooms with breastfeeding area. Shop with local products. The owner has another low cost gas station next to this one with great fuel discounts and a wash area. You can park and sleep without problem in one of its esplanades.

title: (13250) Daimiel - 13 Calle Pontevedra
description: Daimiel. near the center, a few km. natural park of Las Tablas de Daimiel and Motilla de Azuer. Quiet. close gas station, restaurant, workshop, supermarkets

title: (13160) - 20 Avenida Campo de Calatrava
description: However, this location is well signposted for the village. The panel looks very neat and the amenities are there as they should be. Fill in water, discharge waste water and electricity is switched off, washing dishes everything is possible! beautiful concrete slab with enough space!

Cafeteria permanently closed, restaurants closed (Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday...). Nice pool with bar (bar very expensive). Bread service was offered but didn't take place the next morning. In this condition, the place is only suitable for transit as a self-catering.

title: (13005) Ciudad Real - 6B Calle Tomelloso

title: (13310) Valdepeñas - CRP-5214
description: Esplanade with gas station and restaurant bar. The bar is open all night. Many trucks spend the night. In the restaurant we dined very well and the attention was excellent. Being glued to the highway early in the morning you could hear the traffic.

title: (13240) La Solana - 5 Avenida de la Paz
title_short: (13240) La Solana - 5 Avenida de la Paz
description: La Solana motorhome area, area with very spacious pitches, well leveled and with shaded areas. It has all the services, including bathrooms with showers. Of course, there is a charge for the zone and each service is chargeable apart from the night service. Located in a park, 10 minutes walk from the center. Perfect to spend a night, discover the city, buy La Mancha products. Good area near (30 km) from the natural park of Las Lagunas de Ruidera.

title: (13195) Valverde -
description: Parking of the famous castle of Alarcón and its battle, has a route that through QR code tells you the history of the battle from the nearby town of Poblete. The parking lot is quiet with plenty of shade, there is a water fountain nearby and toilets, which are occasionally open... impressive views of both the castle and De la Vega of the Guadiana river, nearby are hiking trails to Valverde and its lagoon for example! A good place to spend the night, we went in the van, and everything was perfect.

title: (13360) Granátula de Calatrava - Cam. de la Aldea del Rey
title_short: (13360) Granátula de Calatrava - Cam. de la Aldea del Rey
description: Very quiet car park day/night. Gravel and asphalt leveling. To sleep you don't hear anything except the sound of nature. Next to an archaeological site of good cultural tourist interest and a Roman bridge (Publio baebio). It has a playground, picnic areas and garbage containers. The town is 4 km away and has all the services (pharmacies, bakeries, bars, tobacconists, grocery stores, banks). The environment is surrounded by olive and almond trees.

title: (13300) El Peral - CR-6441

name: Camper Parking Consuegra
title: (45700) Camper Parking Consuegra
description:
Gravel car park at the foot of the castle and the mills, with picnic tables, ideal for an overnight stay
Very quiet and superb view of the castle lit up at night.
The town itself is a 10 minute walk away.
The walk to the top is difficult and you should take your time.
The road that goes up to the mills / castles is prohibited for equipped vehicles!

title_short: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - 37 Calle Santa Cruz

title: (13600) Área autocaravanas | Carrefour Alcázar de San Juan
title_short: (13600) Área autocaravanas | Carrefour Alcázar de San Juan

title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - 40-42 Calle De Las Lagunas
title_short: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - 40-42 Calle De Las Lagunas
description: Lagunas de Villafranca de los Caballeros, ideal for swimming and spending the day. Free parking and overnight accommodation. Large parking lot where an overnight stay was not a problem. Great for swimming June 2022. I recommend everyone to come to this region

title: (13300) - 211 A-4
description: Parking area managed by the General Directorate of Traffic, with a direct exit from the motorway heading south. It has many parking spaces for vehicles but more adjusted for motorhomes. It has several bathrooms with showers, picnic tables, filling and emptying of sewage as it has a treatment plant. At the entrance there is an information office. Place of prayer for Muslims. It is only open in summer to cross the strait, a pity that it is not open all year.

title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - 14 ኡርባኒሳሲኦን ላስ ላጉናስ

description: Perfect place next to the lagoons of Villafranca de los Caballeros. Flat ground floor. Beaches at 1min on the lake. Bar-Restaurant 2min walk. Peaceful place. Picnic tables and swings. I have spent the night very well.

title: (13390) Pozo de la Serna - 1 Carretera Infantes P
title_short: (13390) Pozo de la Serna - 1 Carretera Infantes P
description: Large parking in a small, quiet village with a beautiful view of nature. In an area where parking spaces are scarce it is welcome.

title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - Unnamed Road
title_short: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros - Unnamed Road
description: A lovely place away from everything. the truth still do not know if we can be or we are going to retire but it is worth visiting and see if you can stay overnight.

title: (45730) Villafranca de los Caballeros -
description: Great place to spend the day quietly or to sleep if you are not afraid, because you are lonely. You can do the bike route around the lagoons or walk to the small lagoon to see the migratory birds.

title: (13440) Argamasilla de Calatrava - Unnamed Road
description: Spot away to spend a night. Accessible by a motorable track.

title: (45710) Madridejos - Autovía del Sur
description: Repsol petrol station, direction Madrid-Seville. Very large parking for campers and caravans. There is, water hose, Wc drain and gray. At 50 meters from Santa Ana restaurant, good price and a cholesterol products store, beautiful.

title: (13380) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the castle of Calatrava. ATTENTION: Only from the afternoon of Sunday to Tuesday morning, since the castle closes on Monday.The rest of the days are usually full during the day, although late in the afternoon any day is good. The views are simply spectacular. Without any service except the bin.

title: (13730) Santa Cruz de Mudela - 12 Paseo Castelar
title_short: (13730) Santa Cruz de Mudela - 12 Paseo Castelar
description: Big parking área in a quiet town (during the day) where to have a rest. Very close to a beautiful municipal park with playgrounds, fountains and benches.

description: Small motorway area with shop, gas station, toilets, restaurant and ... showers!
